content: traditional quilt blocks inspired this fun series of textured crochet afghan blocks the bobble stitches add so much interest with no pesky color changes needed materials h/5 0mm crochet hook 1 skein lion brand vanna s choice yarn medium 4 weight 100% acrylic yarn 3 5oz/100g 170yds/156m shown in honey colorway yarn needle scissors gauge / finished size 12 x 12 square after blocking 7 double_crochet and 3 5 rounds in 2 square notes this blanket square is worked in joined rounds from the center and the wrong side of the work will face the front of your blanket turning chains do not count as a stitch throughout
